WorkItem.Description: In b13.1, when I allow the optimizer to choose all possible gemmings, it creates a gearset with new ungemmed instances of items. This makes it impossible for me to know which gems the optimizer actually chose for the gearset, as well as cluttering my item list.
WorkItem.Summary: Optimizer creates new ungemmed item instances

Comments.Message: Do you have any gems marked as available?

You're right. I had only marked gems as available that I wanted included in my earlier cat model which is why new items were showing up without gems in the bear model. Thanks very much! You can close or delete this item. :)
